title: (Champion suggestion) Averdon, The Spirit Collector
body:
Averdon would be a caster that scales into the late game with spirits collected by killing units/monsters or champions. Spirits gain him bonus effects.
Hp 548+87/lvl 2027hp at 18  HP Regen 6.6/5 -15.6 at 18
Uses 3.5% current health as casting cost.
AD 43+2.680/lvl 88.56 at level 18 Atk speed 0.646+1.4% Armor and Magic Resist both 30+0 ( as spirits would increase them)
Move speed 340
Attack range: 475
Missil speed: 950
Passive: Spirit collector. 
Collects and keeps spirits of fallen enemies Each spirit would increase damage by 0.75 and AP by 1. Large monsters and Champions+2. Assists count 1.  
Armor and Magic Resist are both increased by 0.5. Apon death, loses 15 souls.
Q: Spirit Burst. 9/8.5/8/7.5/7 seconds CD
Shoots a ball of spirits in a line with range of 525. Dealing 40% AP+ 40/85/130/175/220 Magic damage to the first unit hit.
Deals 2 bonus damage for each spirit gathered. If hit, part of the enemies soul is drained healing Averdon 20/25/30/35/40 +10%ap.
W: Soul Burst 10/9.25/8.5/7.75/7 second CD
Busts an enemy within 525 range dealing 10/10/15/15/20% ap+ 10/30/50/70/90 Magic damage/sec for 2 seconds. 
Deals 1 more dmg/sec for every spirit gathered. If they are below 50% hp, their exausted spirit are harmed even more badly and takes 10/20/30/40/50 more damage/second and are slowed by 10/15/20/25/30% for the duration(2 sec).
E: Harvest:  3.5sec CD( not effected by CDR) Range 375
Attempts the harvest of an enemies spirit after 0.33 sec of cast time, gaining double the spirit stack if this makes the kill.
Sucks a portion of the enemies spirit. Dealing 20/25/30/35/40% AP+ 33/55/77/99/121 and 2% max hp magic damage. 
Enemies getting hit again within the 5 sec of the first, they take 5/8/11/14/17 less damage, stacks 5 times.
Heals 10% of the damage dealt.
R: Tide of Souls. 125/110/95sec
After 0.15 sec of mini channelling summons a tide of spirits that runs down enemies in a line of 1750units legth and 500units width at a speed of 250units/0.33sec
Deals 100/175/250+75%AP plus 2/3/4% of their Max HP as damage. +2/4/6 damage/spirit. 
After being hit the damaged enemies are slowed 1% for every 1% hp missing OR 10/20/30%.
Cooldown is reduced by 5 sec for each champion hit. Reduce by 15sec for each champion killed.
Averdon would be a champion that will eventually start become dependent on farming with E, which has a short range but gains twice the effect from the spirits gathered. Champions like lb can use this to her advantage as the 0.33sec to poke and harm Averdon as he is unable to act during the 0.33 sec.
